A character who doesn't want to be a hero but circumstances force them into the role. They may have a dark past or simply want a quiet life.
A enigmatic figure who appears at crucial moments with cryptic advice. Their true motivations remain unclear until a pivotal reveal.
Once a person of high status who lost everything - now seeking redemption or revenge. Their old connections may help or hinder them.
A foretelling that speaks of events yet to come. The heroes may be trying to fulfill it or prevent its dark conclusion.
A cunning character who uses wit and deception rather than brute force. They may be an ally playing both sides or an enemy in disguise.
A promise sealed with blood that binds characters together. Breaking it may have supernatural consequences.
